snippet.title: Szikra - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3107250/Szikra/
Szikra (Spark in Hungarian) is a relaxing, 2.5D side-scrolling short game set in a unique steampunk/fantasy environment inspired by the paintings of Anita Tóth (www.worldswithin.hu).
You have to find your way through vast fields, magical forests, and giant gears in a steaming factory to reach the twisted circus where your friend is locked up. There is no combat, no dying, and no way to fail. However, you will still need a few well-timed jumps, and you must find switches and push boxes around to get to your destination.
The game is free to play on Steam.
Planned release date is 20 August, 2024.

Developed by Imre Pap.
Music by Zsolt Surányi.
